title: N leader Zaeem Qadri passes away
desc: LAHORE - Former Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) leader, ex-member of the Punjab Assembly, and Awam Pakistan Party leader Zaeem Qadri has passed away.

title: Democrats at Munich security summit to urge Europe to stand up to Trump
desc: European leaders divided over how far to accommodate Trump’s ‘wrecking ball’ politics and foreign policy

title: Malaysia’s Opposition: The Need to Close Ranks
desc: To mount a creditable challenge to the ruling coalition, Malaysia’s opposition coalition needs to overcome a list of obstacles, foremost among them infighting within the grouping.

title: Liverpool urged to make double Tottenham transfer raid as 'not too happy' claim made
desc: Didi Hamann believes Micky van de Ven will be on Liverpool's transfer radar this season - along with another Tottenham Hotspur defender

title: The Playmaker Closes Deals on Swiss Box Office Hit 'Barry & Me'
desc: The Playmaker has closed several significant distribution deals on Swiss box office hit 'Barry & Me' ahead of its market premiere in Berlin.

title: ‘We are hopeful’: small signs of recovery for Scotland’s rare capercaillie bird
desc: Number of males at RSPB Abernethy rises to 30, after ‘huge amount of work’ by conservationists in Highlands forests

title: NASA Crew Set for Flight to International Space Station
desc: NASA is set to launch four astronauts to the International Space Station aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, replacing a crew evacuated for a medical issue.

title: Google Docs gets a big Gemini boost focused on accessibility
Bangladesh Nationalist Party claims victory in country’s first election since uprising
desc: The Bangladesh Nationalist Party claims it won the country’s first election since the 2024 uprising, positioning itself to form the next government and potentially reshape Bangladesh’s political landscape after years of intense rivalry and disputed polls.
